law.catch_line: Each petroleum transporter required by regulation to report to the Comptroller shall:...
law.text:
Each petroleum transporter required by regulation to report to the Comptroller shall:
report monthly on the form required by the Comptroller all motor fuel that the petroleum transporter imports into or exports from the State;
keep for 2 years a record of each interstate and each intrastate shipment of motor fuel;
on request, provide these records to the Comptroller; and
report immediately to the Comptroller the loss of any motor fuel, unless the loss is due to:
temperature correction; or
a spill that is reported to another State unit.
